item.title: 000 to 999 in emacs
item.description: ##05:06 Thursday 29 September 2005 There have been times that I’ve needed lists of numbers in order. Mostly for programming things. Today I created such a list using emacs via a keyboard macro. To use it, do M-x edit-kbd-macro and then choose a key combo. (I always use C-x e). Then replace whatever is in the buffer with this text: ;; Keyboard Macro Editor. Press C-c C-c to finish; press C-x k RET to cancel.
